instruction: Generate a story using a GPT-3 model based on the context of the following sentence.
input: Once upon a time there was a dragon that lived in a castle.
output: Once upon a time there was a dragon that lived in a castle. He was a proud and noble creature, but also very lonely. He had been living in the castle for many years and had never seen another dragon. One day, he heard a rumour that there was another dragon who lived in a nearby forest. He was determined to find this dragon, so he set out on a journey across the kingdom. After a long and difficult journey, he finally found the dragon who lived in the forest. They quickly became friends and the two dragons decided to live together in the castle, where they could be happy and always stay together.
